title: What To Look For In A Coach or Mentor
dc:creator: Tracy Brinkmann | Personal Development in the spirit of Tony Robbins, Napoleon Hill, & Zig Ziglar
description:
Why Should You Get a Coach? There are many reasons why we hire a coach or get a mentor and just as many reasons why we do not hire a coach or avoid a mentorship. A coach is not for everyone. But, if you are ready for it, a GOOD coach can really help you. Yesterday I shared the top 7 reasons why you need a coach today let me share what you should look for in that coach that will help you to reach Your Success At Last! - CLICK & LISTEN then LIKE & SHARE!

Your Success At Last DNA | Personal Development in the Spirit of Tony Robbins, Napoleon Hill, Robert Kiyosaki, Jillian Michaels, Jack Canfield, Brian Tracy, Jim Rohn and Zig Ziglar

Think Successfully & Take Action!Tracy "Ace" Brinkmannhttp://YourSuccessAtLast.com
